website_summaries.verdict: While it's not a premium hair dryer and won't work for everyone, it does a good job for most consumers without costing a lot of money.
pros: Made by a recognizable brand in hair care and styling tools
Dries hair quickly without getting extremely hot
cons: Diffuser doesn't work well and tends to fall off while you are drying your hair
Doesn't work well on all hair textures
Some users wish the cord were longer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you have straight hair, thin hair, or oily hair.
customer_reviews.text: Not good for straight hair. Ionic dryers are awful for straight hair that is looking for volume. Returned this item. Ionic dryers are like blasting your hair with a steady stream of conditioner, which is awful for straight hair as it weighs it down.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie K.

customer_reviews.title: and so far I'm glad I did because I like it and have had ...
customer_reviews.text: I researched this hair dryer before I bought it and read some negative reviews about it. I decided to buy it anyway, and so far I'm glad I did because I like it and have had no problems with it at all. I normally run it on high heat and my hair dries quickly. It has not overheated, the cord is plenty long enough, and it conveniently hangs up. 2/9/2018 UPDATE: Still no issues. Highly recommend it. 7/5/2019 UPDATE: No issues, still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: DCinNM

customer_reviews.title: Attachment won't stay on.
customer_reviews.text: I have had a conair blow dryer for 10 yrs and FINALLY decided to purchase another one. Although this product does effectively dry hair and works well.....the attachment won't stay on once the hairdryer gets so hot. It is soooo annoying to have to stop blow drying, pick up the attachment , and then reattach it to continue. I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Sylvester

customer_reviews.title: Great  Hair  Dryerr, But It Gets Too Hot!
customer_reviews.text: Great dryer. I needed the diffuser. Be careful not to set it to high heat if you're using the diffuser. I burned my scalp! I now keep it on the lowest settings.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M.

customer_reviews.title: For $26 is a good blowdryer
customer_reviews.text: I like how much volume of air comes out of it. I like the how you can have two speeds with Cool, Warm or Hot, and also a separate Cool button. What I don't like is the cord is probably 2' shorter than my last dryer (inconvenient). The diffuser is not easily attachable or detachable, I'm glad my husband will use it with the diffuser on. The sound is a bit noisier (high pitch whine) than my last one. Now I see the difference between a more expensive one and this one. Next time I will spend a little more for that longer cord, less sound, and attachments that are easily interchangeable.
customer_reviews.author: TTGOTP

customer_reviews.title: Power cord is shorter than expected
customer_reviews.text: Decent for the price - needed a quick and easy replacement for a blow dryer that burned out. The cord is very short though, my older dryer had at least 6 extra inches and it now affects how I can use this one based on where my plug is in the bathroom. Small issue, but thought I'd mention since I was under the impression that there was a standard cord length.

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer is great. I've had it for about 4 months now. I had a conair 1875 without attachments for over a decade before, still works but I wanted a new one with these two attachments. I don't have any trouble with them coming off too easy, and I set it down and pick it back up a lot when I style my hair. I also really like the setting switches. There is just high and low, and then cool, warm, and hot, as well as the cool button. I think its a great product at a great price. I only wish the cord was retractable for easier storage but it isn't a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Mattie B

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant because I just needed a reasonably priced blow dryer that wasnt going to melt in my hand like the reviews I kept reading about on other blow dryers. I had a Conair before this one that lasted for 6 years or so. But I wasn't ever sold on any Conair products that I've previously had. So I was also hesitant that this product may or may not work. So far, its great! It doesnt get too hot, the attachments fit just fine, and it dries my hair!! I hope this one lasts me for another 6!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Dries super fast & gets hair straight
customer_reviews.text: I rely heavily on these reviews so thought I’d write my own. As a black woman with natural hair, this product is AMAZING! Not only does it get my thick frizzy hair dry within 10-15 mins, but it also gets it fairly straight prior to me using my curling irons. It’s also light weight so my arm doesn’t hurt while I’m using it & the attachments are a great added bonus! Great product
customer_reviews.author: Dominique White

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working After 4 Months of Usage
customer_reviews.text: During the 4 months of usage, on the high heat setting, it emits an unpleasant burnt smell so I will reduce the heat setting. It makes my hair frizzier than ever though it dries quite fast. My cheaper hair dryer gives me less frizz than this. One fine day while using it, the red coil lights up but no air comes out of it. Tried resetting the button but it doesn't work as well. What a waste of time and money. It is such a lousy hair dryer and poorly made andI can't seem to understand why it is so highly raved. STAY AWAY!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea L.

customer_reviews.title: Curly Girls! This one's not for us!
customer_reviews.text: I take my curls very seriously. The diffuser on this hair dryer doesn't do squat for curls. What I've had in the past works much better because the bowl-like shape and edges around the diffuser help hold the hair nicely to dry. My hair was just falling off of this one. The other thing that was a huge deal breaker for me, was that the cord only ran halfway past my little room, which didn't allow me to stand in front of the mirror while drying. That's important to see what's going on.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Talia

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working properly after a couple of days
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a Conair Ionic hair dryer this summer and was very pleased with it. In October, I needed a hair dryer at another location and ordered the Conair Ionic hair dryer since I had been very pleased with it. After a couple of days, it stopped working and would restart only when I pressed the reset button. After this occurred numerous times, I returned the hair dryer and reordered it. The second one also stopped working after a couple of days and behaved similarly. I returned that one and requested a refund. I can only assume the ALCI in these two hair dryers was defective.
customer_reviews.author: Janet C.

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this dryer in July of 2018, barely 8 mos later and it stopped working. One of plug prongs is loose. Can’t fix that. Junk, such a shame that everything we buy doesn’t last like it should, this didn’t last a year and I have short hair so it’s not overuse. It’s the garbage being made and sold. Sad that this is the way things are now
customer_reviews.author: John Easton

customer_reviews.title: It is not as hot as it is supposed to be
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hair dryer a year ago and I’m about to buy a different one because it is not as hot as it should be. From the beginning I thought the heat of this hair dryer was not very strong. I have used the hair dryers (same power) at several hotels and noticed a big difference. Im now shopping for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than more expensive brands
customer_reviews.text: I had an earlier model of this exact dryer for years until it finally died last year. I could not find this one at the time, so I tried 3-4 more expensive dryers that I did not like for one reason or another. The one I finally stuck with (~$80) died after less than a year. At that time, I found this dryer again and ordered it right away. It’s lighter weight than many I used and has good power without blowing my hair wild. Unless you’re looking to spend at least $100+, this is the best option I’ve come across and I’m very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I have had this little blow dryer for a while now. I was skeptical at first that it could do the job. I have very curly hair and just need to scrunch my hair while I am blowing it out. Easy. Well, this machine, with it's defuser works really well. My only complaint it that the plastic is pretty skimpy. Wish they had used a better grade of plastic. But for now, so far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: M. Mcewan

customer_reviews.title: Works with hand shaped hair diffuser!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dryer in the hopes that it would fit this hand shaped diffuser.  It fits perfectly! Once I got the dryer I realized that it has some nice features. The one I most appreciate the fact that the temperature and air speed are separate. This allows me to use high heat and low air speed. The end of the dryer also has a rubberized feel, which helps the diffuser stay on better than it would if it were slick plastic. Length of cord is great for my set up. I hope this dryer lasts because it’s really perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Lannette

customer_reviews.title: Works great but cord is too short!
customer_reviews.text: This dryer is working well, I like the design of the controls and that it is light weight. KWhen you grip the handle the controls stay set. My old dryer was so frustrating to use as the way the controls were aligned on the handle allowed them to be constantly altered by your grip. I was always having to readjust. No problem here with this one. However, the cord is too short which was very surprising to me considering price of dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna Noel

customer_reviews.title: Matte finish comes off
customer_reviews.text: This hairdryer works well, however I wouldn't buy it again. The cord is a bit shorter than most (an extra 6 inches would be so helpful), and the matte finish peels off! I don't really care what it looks like; my complaint is that there are little black flakes of plastic all over my hands, hair and the floor after I use it. Plus, the words hot, cold, warm, etc. are stamped on the matte finish, so that has almost completely disappeared.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: POORLY CONSTRUCTED - DO NOT PURCHASE!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm only giving this product 1 star because it is technically still working. The plastic on the tail of the blow dryer is completely coming off and melting with minimal use. The return window for this product is very short and I am stuck with a defective product with little to no recourse. I would suggest that you STAY AWAY FROM THIS PRODUCT. It is clearly poorly constructed and for the same price you can get a blow dryer that does not start falling apart 3 weeks into use.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn D.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Thick Fine Hair
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had this dryer ages ago. It's lightweight and works great for my fine hair that is also thick. Using the low heat, low blower, it was dry in short order. I think this dryer is close to half the weight of my recent dryer. Noise volume, another of my concerns, is also wonderful. I didn't use any attachments because they weren't a concern of mine.
customer_reviews.author: GoFro

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: My BabyBliss Pro dryer went out after about 7 years and this is what I replaced it with after seeing so many great reviews. It took just as long to dry my hair with the Conair, even though my last one was old and wasn't Tourmaline (this one is). The cord is also VERY short when plugged into a lower near-ground plugin and it puts out an odd smell when being used. I'm not sure if that will go away with time but I don't know that I will keep this long enough to find out. All around it did exactly what it was supposed to do: dry hair. But ultimately I had higher expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Hoeffel

customer_reviews.title: A great hair dryer!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hair dryer! Easy to use, not too heavy, and it does not fry your hair. It is very easy to switch temperatures and to switch speeds. I do not want a super fancy hair dryer- I just want to dry my hair without damaging it. The cold shot is great to finish things off.
customer_reviews.author: JAS

customer_reviews.title: No Frizz and Half the Drying Time
customer_reviews.text: My hair dryer of 15 years finally gave out so I decided to get this one with the technology that uses the no-frizz ionic technology...so glad I did. I have slightly wavy hair that 'poofs' out after being blown dry but no more! I also notice that this is quieter than my old one and WAY more powerful. I can get the job done in half the time (and I have long hair...lots of it). The price is right and it's everything I need.
customer_reviews.author: Trepte

customer_reviews.title: Decent dryer, but coating flakes off
customer_reviews.text: The dryer is decent overall, and would probably be a 5 stars for this price point, but the coating is a major problem. It started rippling within months of usage (see picture), and now flakes off in my hand when I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I am a 4c natural and I needed a hair dryer that could help me achieve a flawless blowout. This dryer has exceeded my expectations. For the price it is exceptional quality. I am beyond happy with my purchase. I love that it has a cool shot and also allows me to blow dry on cool. I was concerned at first because I thought it would be heavy. It is a sturdy and well built dryer without being heavy. Overall I am satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia A.

customer_reviews.title: Best Hair Dryer I've Ever Owned!
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer dries my long hair faster than any I've ever owned. I've noticed a marked decrease in frizz also. I was skeptical that one hair dryer would be different from any other, but this one works way better than the one I replaced! It's also light weight and relatively quiet. I'd highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Happy happy.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Used on low setting in tandem with my softhood hair dryer attachment. Happy with both purchases. I have natural hair so I don't blow dry often but I think the dryer gives just enough heat to dry hair without frying you ears and forehead.the product itself is lightweight and came with a diffuser and concentrater attachment.
customer_reviews.author: G.darling

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but not cheap-feeling dryer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hair dryer after mine died, because I had used this one at my daughter's and liked it. I like that the "warm" temperature setting is truly warm, not hot! I like that it is lightweight, although it probably isn't compact enough for traveling. The time it takes to dry my hair is average. I haven't had it long, so can't speak to its longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Conscientious Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Decent dryer, only issue is it tangles my hair
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent hair dryer. I needed a new one to replace a Revlon dryer that died. Saw reviews for this Conair and decided to get it. It dries my hair semi fast. My only real issue it my hair gets very knotted/tangled as I dry. I have never had this issue with a hair dryer ever. For a while I thought well maybe it’s some hair product I was using, but no, it is definitely this dryer. It happens every single time. I have to really brush thru my hair periodically to remove the knots. I mean maybe this could just be my issue, but just wanted to share.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Plante

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! I was only going to use it as a dryer for a dryer attachment, but one day I needed to dry my hair - I usually just air dry my hair, but when I used this blowdryer, my hair was dry in under 4 minutes. I sectioned my hair into 4 parts and each section took less than 1 minute. I could probably say almost 30 seconds. I'm astonished.
customer_reviews.author: reina609

customer_reviews.title: Lasts for years!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product off of Amazon in 2011. It's 2020 now, and it has lasted me for about 10 years. I highly, highly, HIGHLY recommend it if you are looking for an affordable blow dryer that works well. I still use my blow dryer to this day, like WOW! I didn't even realize I bought it almost a decade ago until I saw the option to review it come up on my account. I haven't had to replace it either.
customer_reviews.author: Rozy123

customer_reviews.title: Already bought 2!
customer_reviews.text: Love this dryer so much I bought a second one already (not because one broke, but because I wanted to stop sharing my dryer with others in the house so I bought them their own). Amazing for the price! I've had many other dryers die on me since it takes so long to dry my hair but this one is just as good as the first time I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Danna

customer_reviews.title: Concentrator Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: Diffuser attaches fine, but the concentrator keeps falling off. Can't even get through blow drying my hair without it shifting or completely falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Vercher

customer_reviews.title: Regular dryer
customer_reviews.text: Just a regular hair dryer. I just thought it was going to be lighter. It’s light don’t get me wrong but I think its just an average blow dryer and I was looking for a extremely light one I guess. Lol This does not dry your hair any faster than a dryer from your local Walmart. I think they said you can dry your hair in two minutes with this blow dryer so maybe I could dry my hair in two minutes if I cut all my hair off and had a short pixie cut.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni HR

customer_reviews.title: Just no power
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to use this... But no power. It works just fine but not as powerful as one thats 100$. You get what you pay for i guess lol
customer_reviews.author: Review Man

customer_reviews.title: SUPER CURLY WRINGLETS-works smashingly
customer_reviews.text: I have exteme curls. Not wavy, not kinda curly, i have full blown wringlets. When i use a normal blowdryer I get fatter more of a wrap-type of curl. Well this guy, It's leaves a different texture to my curls. My curls are softer, with more of a bounce. I know its the tourmaline. I use it for certain occasions but it does dry my hair faster. Would for sure get it again
customer_reviews.author: Ryder

customer_reviews.title: Terrible for curly hair !
customer_reviews.text: I have naturally curly hair so I like to dry my hair using the diffuser on high heat but the low setting. It takes FOREVER with this hair dryer and my hair still ends up super frizzy and dry. In addition, the cord is very short so I have to stand right up against the counter in my bathroom while drying my hair. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 9 Months
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this until it broke! It started making a terrifying sound out of the blue. I unplugged immediately. It made the same sound when I checked it a few days later and it would be irresponsible for me to use again.
customer_reviews.author: Zade Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Great sized hair drier
customer_reviews.text: The attachments tend to fall off when I'm blow drying, and the blow dryer gets super hot very quickly. Yet it's effective, dries hair quickly, comes with the perfect variety of attachments, and is a very good size. It's easy to manage the hair drier plus a brush and hair, which is rare. My hair also dries straight (ish) with relatively low frizz (from a 3C curl). It's easy to travel with and use full time, so I only need to own 1.
customer_reviews.author: Arielle

customer_reviews.title: Quiet but powerful
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new blow dryer that was powerful but relatively quiet. This Conair excels at both. It has a lot of different settings from gentle to strong, cool to hot. Power and heat settings are on different switches so you can use different combinations. I hate loud, high pitched hair driers so I was delighted that this is pretty quiet and not at all "whiny". It comes with the typical attachments. The only downsides, in my opinion are that the switches are not very comfortable to use (a minor quibble) and it is a smidge on the large side (which is really just more of a personal preference). All in all, I'm very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: DawnMarch

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this hair dryer. It has a cool setting which stays on - by the switch, no need to hold the button the entire time like the others. A very nice option if you use the cool setting frequently. It really saved a ton of drying time as well. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Hans A.

customer_reviews.title: Love this blow dryer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this blow dryer in April of 2012. I love it!! It’s the best one I’ve ever had. It finally quit today and I am ordering the exact same one again because I love it so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Merrell

customer_reviews.title: Great Inexpensive Hair Dryer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this dryer because I now needed a diffuser. This diffuser stays on the dryer like it's supposed to. Yay! Sometimes the diffusers and other attachments won't stay on the hair dryer and I was afraid of this. Good dryer for the money. Glad I purchased it! Not for traveling, as it's full size, but it is lightweight if you don't have a travel dryer, if that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Mary McClanahan

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these back in 2002, and I figured if this new one lasts as long, we're happy! No issues with it, it works as I want and has pretty good force of air coming out to dry my long, shoulder-blade length hair in 5 minutes. The other one started "slowing down" after 7 years of daily use, so it was time for this new one.
customer_reviews.author: MyOpinionMatters

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Who knew a hair dryer could cause so much damage....not until I tried this did I realize how bad my Remington one was. My hair felt different after using this once. No dryness or fly aways. My broken ends are finally growing back. This thing is ligit!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hairdryer for my daughter based off of the reviews. Then when my $60 hair dryer died (I was a bit happy about that) I ordered this for myself. It is a great hair dryer. Light weight, dries well. I don't use it on the hottest setting. I had read that the ceramic dryers can damage hair when used on to hot of a setting because you end up over drying your hair without knowing it. The aiming nozzle comes off a little bit too easy, but it's not bad. It really only comes off if I bump it on the counter or cabinet. For the price and performance I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: A Goldie

customer_reviews.title: Lasted me over 4 years
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for $29.99 November 2012. Now 4+ years later I'm need a new one. Sounds like a good deal to me. I do wish this dried faster but my hair is thick and it's all relative, right? I dropped this a lot and it lasted all this time..... until it started smoking and sparking while I was staying at an airbnb.. No other signs of issues before that, so it gave me quite a scare. Since it's been a few years, I am hoping to find something better and more up to date.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Nine years old and still going strong!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter asked for a recommendation for a hairdryer. I recommended one I've been using for years now that is simple and JUST WORKS. I checked when I bought it and discovered it was purchased in July 2010. That's nearly NINE YEARS AGO and it still works like new. Thank you Conair for making such a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Aggie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very light! Attachments are perfect! Beautiful and elegant design! Hot, Warm, Cool, High, and Low settings! Not too loud!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid dryer with annoying concentrator
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer lasted me a few days short of 4 years (daily use). It's lightweight, powerful, and leaves my fine hair pretty shiny. The negative, for me, and this became a huge negative, was that the concentrator pops off CONSTANTLY. At first it was annoying, but it became infuriating to have to pause blow drying to chase down the concentrator halfway across the room. (Like, 3-4 times per blow dry!) If you plan to use the concentrator a lot I would suggest you purchase something else. My one other dig would be that the cord was too short for me. Otherwise, it's a pretty solid, cheap dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: It Drys
customer_reviews.text: I use this unit for extra drying off after taking a shower and I am happy with the way it works. I only need it on for a few minutes to do this job.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Andrus

customer_reviews.title: VERY POOR QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: just used for two weeks the coating of the dryer got sticky to hand and easy to peeling off (see the picture attached). it is so funny that the review is pretty good so far. I bought it just for the good review. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONY! DON'T BE CHEATED.
customer_reviews.author: Young

customer_reviews.title: Definitely try this out!
customer_reviews.text: I love this blow dryer! I am really lazy with doing my hair, but I’m trying to learn more styles I can do especially with blow drying to limit the amount of use from the straightener I use on my hair and this product makes it really easy!!! I’ve had it for a few months now and haven’t had any issues with it. When I first opened the package, the straight head replacement fell under something in my room, and I thought the package was missing it. I contacted Amazon and they were immediately offering to send me a new one! Thought that was awesome on their part. :)
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: love this hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: love this hair dryer. It had great reviews & my old one almost caught on fire. I used it all weekend & love the attachments they came with. I use the comb one for voluminous hair & then the other one for when I am keeping it straight. It also has great power, dries really fast keeping my mornings on time finally! ha great purchase & am super happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Bad buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dryer last October and used it every other day. I always used it on med-heat + low-speed setting; never on high-heat or high-speed. And always took care not to run it continuously for long periods to avoid it from getting over-heated. Yet it just stopped working only after 9 months of usage. You get what you pay for, I guess!
customer_reviews.author: Rutika

customer_reviews.title: Best dryer
customer_reviews.text: This dryer is very powerful and also blows air out in a more diffused way than my last hair dryer. My hair now dries in half the time. And the dryer never gets too hot so it won't cause damage to hair. Well made, powerful, functional.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Bleck - Buy Something of Better Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hair dryer a couple of months ago after my old Conair died. I like to use my dryers on low speed, but high heat. Although the two settings should be independent, this dryer is just lukewarm on low speed. It also made my hair fuzzy, and while it was lightweight - it felt cheap. I quit using it two months after I started using it and invested in a better dryer. I purchased the Elchim 2001 through Amazon, and while it's a bit more expensive ($80), it's worth every penny. I would not recommend the Conair 1875, unless you want your hair to look like a fuzzy mess.
customer_reviews.author: E. R. Hagen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Less than two years and it broke. Cheaply made and not as strong/ fast as my last considering that I had over 8 years
customer_reviews.author: Jamaya

customer_reviews.title: Dries my hair faster and quieter than Revlon's 1875 Watt.
customer_reviews.text: This replacement hair dryer blows harder and dries my hair faster than Revlon's RV544PKF that recently died when I dropped it. The speed and heat sliders initially felt a bit awkward compared to the press on/off switch on Revlon's, but it also doesn't switch on accidentally when I place it in a caddy holder. The rear vent is much easier to clean with a flip out grill cover over a smooth filter that I can simply wipe off. The noise level is lower as well so I'm happy that I paid a bit more this time around for a better hair dryer.
customer_reviews.author: RescueMa

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Device
customer_reviews.text: This blower really does have Three heat settings (high, low, cool) as well as the quick cool button if you like to keep it on a heat setting with occasional cooling. There is also both high and low speed settings on the fan. The 5 foot cord means you don't have extra wire to get knotted. But then, some need longer cords; if so look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Rock

customer_reviews.title: Works great for curls!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and price. I have used it weekly for the last few months and have had no issues. I use the diffuser for my curly, fine hair and it adds to my curl definition and volume (not frizz).
customer_reviews.author: Maegan Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good but a couple things
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I've been using it for about three weeks now and like it a lot. Two points on why I didn't give it five stars. The heat is very targeted into one place - meaning it doesn't spread out like my old dryers used to do (if that makes sense). Maybe that's intentional but I didn't realize it would be like that. Also, the control buttons on the front are a little cheap. They're by that sturdy. No issues with them yet, but I oils easily see them popping off as it gets older. That said, I love the finish, it does the job and you can't beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: lunacoyo

customer_reviews.title: Pretty let down
customer_reviews.text: So, we bought this dryer as a replacement for my wife's old, loud unit. Unboxed it, and it felt nice and solidly built. And it was about mid-range, volume wise. Also a good selection of heat and fan-speed adjustments. But, the first morning of use, it ran for about 3-4 minutes, then the breaker-plug began to buzz loudly, and emit smoke. All use was discontinued, and was returned for a refund. I award it 2 stars for it being a potentially good unit, but subtract 3 for failing. This seems like a fluke, as most of the reviews are positive, but I'm going to be searching for a different dryer anyway.
customer_reviews.author: MechChef

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was searching high and low for the next hairdryer to get, as the only one I had had was a travel size. I was about to purchase a higher end hairdryer, but after reading about this one and being a Conair user for many many years, I'm so glad I picked this! It isn't loud hardly at all and I have SUPER thick and shoulder length hair. All of my hair is dry in about 15 minutes!! I hope it lasts for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Bulky buttons
customer_reviews.text: Overall, esp for the price, it's ok, and while not really thrilled, won't be returning it. Really, my only complaint (and for my slightly arthritic fingers a substantive complaint) is the almost flush-mounted speed and heat control buttons on the handle. Two narrow buttons tight into each other, and small ridges to use to push up or down. Makes it kinda clumsy to use. If I were using this daily it would be a deal breaker, but once a week or so it's ok to put up with. And an ok price. Hope this helped.
customer_reviews.author: A Dogged shopper

customer_reviews.title: Don’t drop it. You will be sad
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these but in a different color and fell in love. I literally dropped it on my ceramic tile 3 weeks after I got it and it blew up. I couldn’t stand not having it and ordered another one. This is a great professional grade dryer at a great price!!!!! Just don’t drop it on the tile!!! Quick drying time. Not too heavy. Great attachments and easy to clean. Happy I chose a no name brand over some I have found in store. This one is the beat one I have had at this price point. You won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Foster

customer_reviews.title: Thick hair recommendation!
customer_reviews.text: I have thick hair and my last conair, from Walmart that lasted about 4 years, took forever to dry my hair. This ceramic one dries in half the time! Takes a couple seconds to get completely hot but that's fine. Very lightweight and easy to hold for a long period of time. Much quieter than old conair products as well.
customer_reviews.author: C.Benes

customer_reviews.title: I love this hair dryer!
customer_reviews.text: My gym has this hair dryer and I liked it so much I went in search of one to buy. It dries your hair so quickly and is lightweight. I like that it has 3 heat setting and low and high. I dry my hair on cool so it's nice to still have the high speed. It is quiet and lightweight. I wish it had a cord keeper but with all that I like about it, I just use a rubber band on the cord. It also has an easy filter to clean. Great hair dryer. Get it!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Godsoe

customer_reviews.title: loveeee
customer_reviews.text: i love this hairdryer! It was definitely an upgrade from my last one (my moms from like the 90s). It dries my hair well, and i love the way it looks and feels
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I have fine, curly-curly hair. I haven't used a hair dryer in year, always air dry. However, for this winter I decided to use the hair dryer instead of walking outside with cold, wet hair. Works great, doesn't frizz at all!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Good dryer
customer_reviews.text: I had my last Conair blow dryer for over 10 years (and it was still technically working when I tossed it) which is why I went with this brand again. I have not been disappointed so far.. This dryer gets plenty hot and dries my hair fast, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Kaylin

customer_reviews.title: Worth its price!
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for I guess. It's light enough, strong airflow, and gets the job done. It looses a star for me because my hair has felt SO much dryer and more damaged, I have been using full force air and medium heat/cool, and the difuser is big bulky and worth using. It feels cheaper but for the price I really am not complaining about it. Next dryer I'll save up and get something healthier for my hair but I only occasionally dry with a dryer. Good for me!
customer_reviews.author: Joe G

customer_reviews.title: best available bargain hair dryer available
customer_reviews.text: For the money, best available bargain hair dryer available. Not only do I think this outperforms much more expensive blow dryers, but I​ believe you are basically stealing from this company for the great product they have produced. My hair doesn't frizz, looks great, and it has plenty of airflows to dry it very quickly. Love this hair dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Senne

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I love how lightweight yet powerful this dryer is. This is my second one - the first one lasting over four years but finally burning out, likely from my hair getting caught inside lol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stronger blower with some pretty granular control over how the air is presented
customer_reviews.text: Buttons are very low profile. You have to slide this thing up to turn on. It's got two sliders. In theory that should give you more control over the device. However, what really happens is you peal off the top layer of your skin each time you try to turn it on when your damp fingers slide all over it. Sometimes I find myself required to use nails to get it on in a misty room. Besides the button the dryer is solid. Stronger blower with some pretty granular control over how the air is presented.
customer_reviews.author: Vhaine

customer_reviews.title: This hair drier is not bad for the money
customer_reviews.text: This hair drier is not bad for the money. It has a very plastic feel but it is made out of plastic after all. The biggest grudge I have with this product is the buttons. They dont have a good amount of grip and cannot easily switch between the levels. I use this a lot with hair products and sometimes still have product on my hands when using, so it makes it near impossible to turn it on. Also, the prongs on the plug seems to slip out of the plug frequently. This has happened on multiple plugs.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Dries well without over-drying.
customer_reviews.text: I liked most aspects of this hair drier (dries well, without frying my hair) and found it fairly easy to adjust to the concentrator (I'm short, have short arms, and an elongated nozzle can be a tad tricky. But this drier is overall smaller than many, which makes it easier to maneuver). However, I likely will not be using the diffuser. My hair is thin and dries quickly, which means that for styling purposes, I generally need to focus more on shaping than drying. I'll see if I can come up with a creative use for the diffuser; if not, I'll recycle it.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.W-B

customer_reviews.title: Great Hair Dryer With Strong Airflow
customer_reviews.text: Unlike most hair dryers, it has high volume air flow. I also like the variety of settings. Also, it’s easy to clean the filter.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine A

customer_reviews.title: Super efficient
customer_reviews.text: Omg this is a great product! I thought about splurging for the Dyson hairdryer, but couldn’t justify the cost. This thing is amazing and dries very quickly. It’s not too loud too, and the diffuser attachment keeps waves/curls in place.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Best blow dryer!!
customer_reviews.text: Best blow dryer I've ever owned. It is lite weight and the buttons are just right. Sometimes the button placement is inconvenient because you constantly hit a button you don't want while drying your hair. This one is not like that. I have noticed too I don't have to dry my hair as long. Of all of the expensive dryers I've bought, this one is the all around best!!
customer_reviews.author: B. Denise

customer_reviews.title: Smart slider controls rather than buttons.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for the control design and positioning. Because it's a slide bar rather than buttons, I don't accidentally turn it off while using it. I love it for that reason. It's not that hot though. Very lightweight which is a plus. Overall I am pleased and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: hoarsewhisperer

customer_reviews.title: The switches are way too difficult to slide!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this hairdryer except the buttons. It has two slide buttons, one to turn it on and one to change the temperature. They are extremely hard to slide and I actually have to use both hands and dig my fingernail into them to get them to slide. After using this for a few months daily the buttons haven't really loosened up much as I had hoped they would. It blows hard, gets hot, and dries my hair quickly, but I definitely wouldn't buy it again or recommend it to anyone else due to the switches.
customer_reviews.author: C. LaPole

customer_reviews.title: Glad I upgraded to a more powerful blow dryer that ...
customer_reviews.text: I use blow dryers more when I bathe my dog than on myself, and my old travel connair took forever. This is surprisingly lightweight, and the "warm" setting dries my dog quickly without overheating. It also dries my own hair quickly. Glad I upgraded to a more powerful blow dryer that is still lightweight. Would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this hairdryer years ago and it worked perfectly for 3+ years of daily use. I liked it so much I bought the same one as a replacement when that finally gave out. Gets the job done quickly and pretty quietly.
customer_reviews.author: Arielle

customer_reviews.title: nice hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: nice hairdryer, no issues, I like that it has multiple settings and comes with attachments, good value for the price
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: ... three years ago and it is still working just fine for me
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hair dryer over three years ago and it is still working just fine for me. I have extremely thick hair and this dryer is able to get it dry in 15 minutes which is great. The only issue with it is that the outside coating of the dryer did start to flake a while ago making the dryer looking a bit shabby and older. I don't use the styling attachment which I guess some other people had trouble with. Functionally though it has performed great over the last three years, and has withstood many many drops.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Best hair dryer I have owned!
customer_reviews.text: Easily the best dryer I have owned! Gets quite hot for styling. My one issue with it is that the back grill tends to pop off, but other than that, I am very happy with this. I use this quite a bit as I blow out my long hair almost every day and there has been little damage to my hair and the dryer is still performing well after repeated uses.
customer_reviews.author: MV

customer_reviews.title: Cord not long enough
customer_reviews.text: The cord was not as long as advertised. You cannot reach your head, standing straight up, with the cord plugged in at floor level. I bought this because I need a long cord. it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: C. Gillman

customer_reviews.title: Great Dryer
customer_reviews.text: Great, strong hairdryer. Powerful air and it doesn’t get too hot and it dries my thick hair in less time than my older dryer. Also the outside is a matte finish and it never gets hot. I love this dryer
customer_reviews.author: EW

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this for the diffuser...
customer_reviews.text: I have curly hair and any hairdryer I use needs to have a diffuser attachment. The hair dryer itself worked fine, but the diffuser does not do its job properly. I noticed my hair blowing around which is not supposed to happen. I will keep it to use in other capacities but not for the diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy T

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect, well made and love the diffuser
customer_reviews.text: I love my blow dryer it came with a diffuser which I needed for my curly hair. I couldn’t ask for a better hair dryer. Will purchase same one again when I have to. Doubly I’ll have to in a long t8 e because it is very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Purvis

customer_reviews.title: Good dryer for the price
customer_reviews.text: It is a good dryer for the price. Better than some much more expensive ones I’ve tried. The only complaint I have is that sometimes the diffuser falls off when the nozzle gets hot. If there were threads to attach it instead of by compression the problem would be solved.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. M

customer_reviews.title: Good Hair Dryer
customer_reviews.text: I like the two gadgets that come with it. They help keep me from burning my hair to a crisp. The cooling down button is a bonus as well. The length of the cord is fairly long and you can adjust the heat settings along with how high you want the air to go. I wish there was more heat behind the settings though. I seem to be drying my hair for a few minutes longer than I did with my previous dryer. But all in all, good value with lots of gadgets.
customer_reviews.author: WhenJamieSmiles

customer_reviews.title: Fights Frizz!  Great Dryer with Diffuser Option
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair dryer! It helps me look put together every day with minimal effort - I just scrunch some curl creme into my hair and use the diffuser. The tourmaline really does seem to work, as my hair calms down after I use it. It gets very hot if you need it, and the cool button works. The material and size are very easy to grip and help to reduce hand fatigue. Great dryer!!
customer_reviews.author: Julia M.

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Horrible hair dryer. I have thick curly hair, and it dried up my hair and frizzed it up so bad. If you want to use it to dry your hair, it's fine. However, it's a bad choice for styling. I ended up buying another salon style one.
customer_reviews.author: Sunflower

customer_reviews.title: Not at all nice
customer_reviews.text: For the price I expected better. Ive gotten the same quality for less than $20. I wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.author: CLT

customer_reviews.title: Did not make it to its 4th birthday.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in January of 2013 and sadly it stopped blowing hot air this week. It still works but the air is no longer hot. I thought the life of this products would be much longer. It was great while it lasted. The paint peeled off the handle but that was my only complaint. The diffuser stayed on pretty well and it was light. I use it everyday so maybe almost 4 years is its lifetime. I'm not that in love with it to order it again, I'm going to try a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Overall it works, could have a bit more power ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall it works, could have a bit more power, but for the price it is decent. The attachments have a tendency to fall off unfortunately, so if you're blow drying with close proximity to the toilet, make sure the lid is down!
customer_reviews.author: Erikatastrophe

customer_reviews.title: Helps with frizz works like a dream.
customer_reviews.text: Love this blow dryer! I have pretty frizzy hair, and this actually helps cut down on it. It doesn't make the frizz worse, which some have in the past and for the price can't pass up. It is full size, but isnt bad traveling with. We just clamp the cord and throw it in the suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Goodchilds

product_meta.title: Conair 1875 Watt Ionic Ceramic Fast Drying Lightweight Hair Dryer Includes Diffuser and Concentrator Black Hair Dryer
product_meta.description: Color:BlackThe Conair 1875 Watt Ionic Ceramic Hair Dryer guarantees style with every use. This advanced styling tool features a powerful high-torque DC motor that delivers powerful airflow, helping you dry and style your hair faster. The Tourmaline Ceramic technology generates infrared heat for quick and gentle drying, while minimizing heat damage to make hair less frizzy and more manageable. The Ionic Conditioning technology in this hair dryer creates a cloud of negative ions that can help reduce frizz by up to 75%, and contribute to shinier, overall healthier looking hair. The no-slip grip provides comfortable styling and a hinged filter helps clean the hair dryer easily. The 3 Heat/ 2 Speed feature allows for custom heat and airflow to enhance waves, curls and sleek styles. A cool shot button locks style in place. Includes a concentrator for smooth and sleek styles, as well as a diffuser for curls and waves.
feature_bullets: Conair Ionic Ceramic Hair Dryer features Tourmaline Ceramic Technology which helps prevent heat damage plus Ionic Conditioning for smooth; shiny looking hair and less frizz
Lightweight; powerful high torque DC motor dries hair fast; Conair 225 Hair Dryer weighs less than 2 lbs
3 Heat and 2 Speed settings for all hair types plus Cool Shot button locks style in place; 5.5 foot power cord
Includes Diffuser for textured styles and Concentrator for smooth styles
Hinged filter for easy maintenance and cleaning; No slip grip for comfortable styling

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
